content: I believe that changing search criteria names counts as a substantive change. Is that something that can be tolerated right now? (CapabilityStatement and OperationDefinition will be stuck at level 2 otherwise, though we could give them special dispensation to move forward as level 3 for this one publication)
That does effect the code generated outputs.
it's substantiative. FMG can approve a change like that
Opinions from those that are impacted on whether such changes are acceptable? (Defining and/or renaming search criteria) There's probably 10+ in the spec as a whole that would be impacted.
I don't mind if it happens at the end of the QA period. I can't deal with it now process wise
